title: Defeat of separatism and terrorism has given us the opportunity to engage in open discussions without fear of guns, says President Rajapaksa at SAARC
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) “The defeat of separatism and terrorism since then has given us now the opportunity to engage in open discussions and reach consensus, without the fear of guns. With the strong mandate expressed at both the recent Presidential and Parliamentary elections, I am now ready…
